plot: Set in "Bushberg" after the economy has collapsed (again), accidental roommates Cynthia, Edgar and Goblin navigate a world full of gay yoga teachers, waffle trucks, huggings (hipster muggings), reverse gentrification, and puppet militias.
plot_en: Set in "Bushberg" after the economy has collapsed (again), accidental roommates Cynthia, Edgar and Goblin navigate a world full of gay yoga teachers, waffle trucks, huggings (hipster muggings), reverse gentrification, and puppet militias.
plot_es: Set in "Bushberg" after the economy has collapsed (again), accidental roommates Cynthia, Edgar and Goblin navigate a world full of gay yoga teachers, waffle trucks, huggings (hipster muggings), reverse gentrification, and puppet militias.
title: Bodega
